name: The Last Airship
description:
Something small. It continually spawns enemies until they overwhelm you. The player is procedurally generated, and is currently way too big.

CONTROLS:

Press R to restart

W, A, S, D, to move

Mouse to move and Left Click to fire

I ain't really workin' on it, though I might pick it up again later. I just wanted to put it up.
